testcase.name: print an hello message

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: " > Task :greet property(java.lang.String, fixed(class java.lang.String, Hello from)) Gradle
Deprecated Gradle features were used in this build, making it incompatible with Gradle 7.0. Use '--warning-mode all' to show the individual deprecation warnings. See https://docs.gradle.org/6.5/userguide/command_line_interface.html#sec:command_line_warnings
BUILD SUCCESSFUL in 3s 1 actionable task: 1 executed " should include substring "Hello from Gradle"
